election_record.label: Connecticut 1821 U.S. House of Representatives

overview.note: Samuel W. Gilman and an unknown candidate received an unknown number of votes.

sub_unit.name: Huntington
sub_unit.note: Ansel Sterling received 14 votes as Anson Sterling.

sub_unit.name: Monroe
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Monroe.

sub_unit.name: Sherman
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Sherman.

sub_unit.name: Bristol
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 1 vote as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: East Hartford
sub_unit.note: Ebenezer Stoddard received 65 votes as Eleazer Stoddard.

sub_unit.name: Farmington
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 1 vote as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: Granby
sub_unit.note: Ebenezer Stoddard received 1 vote as Eleazer Stoddard.

sub_unit.name: Sharon
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Sharon.

sub_unit.name: Watertown
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 2 votes as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: Coventry
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Coventry.

sub_unit.name: Union
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Coventry.

sub_unit.name: Pomfret
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 1 vote as Nathan Smith.
